title: Hour 1: There’s Something About Cooper Rush
description:
The entire crew is rushing to takes on this NFL Monday morning including Cooper Rush, Kliff Kingsbury, Bailey Zappe, and more before we transition from Mike Schur's Stat of the Day to Mike Schur's Brett Favre Outrage of the Day. Then, Mike's Top 5 Ballhawks and Tony's Top 5 NFL Observations...hey!
